title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2254/1999 of 25 October 1999 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2385/91 laying down detailed rules for certain special cases regarding the definition of sheep meat and goat meat producers and producer groups
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2254/1999
of 25 October 1999
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2385/91 laying down detailed rules for certain special cases regarding the definition of sheep meat and goat meat producers and producer groups
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The section of Part I of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2385/91 relating to the geographical areas in the autonomous community of Valencia is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply to applications submitted in respect of the 1999 and subsequent marketing years.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
